content.question: During the Cultural Revolution in China, Liu Chunhua’s oil painting Chairman Mao en Route to Anyuan was reproduced in mass quantities primarily to elicit which of the following responses from viewers?

choices.label: Widespread admiration for the diverse beauty of rural China
Universal reverence for a heroic and idealized leader
Fear of the consequences of rebelling against the Chinese emperor
Curiosity about Mao Zedong’s Long March across China

content.answer: Universal reverence for a heroic and idealized leader
